definitions.definition: A mythical beast having the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle .
A griffon vulture , a large vulture ( Gyps fulvus ) found in the mountainous parts of Southern Europe, North Africa, and Asia Minor , supposed to be the "eagle" of the Bible.
A person who has just arrived from Europe .
A cadet newly arrived in British India: half English, half Indian.
A watchful guardian , especially a duenna in charge of a young woman .

main_definition: A mythical beast having the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle .
secondary_definitions: A griffon vulture , a large vulture ( Gyps fulvus ) found in the mountainous parts of Southern Europe, North Africa, and Asia Minor , supposed to be the "eagle" of the Bible.
( dated , India ) A person who has just arrived from Europe .
A cadet newly arrived in British India: half English, half Indian.
A watchful guardian , especially a duenna in charge of a young woman .
